root.description: DetailsIron and Blood: warriors of Ravenloft was released on October 31, 1996 and is set in the Dungeons Dragons Universe. The Game was Released on the Sega Saturn PC and Sony PlayStation.Iron and blood Is a 3d fighter resembling Namco's 3d fighter Soul Edge. Iron and blood was Developed by Take-two Interactive and was Published by Acclaim. Out of all 3 versions the PlayStation was the only one that got a playable demo.
